name: CAT4RUNNER
description:
"COLLECT STARS, DODGE OBSTACLES TO MAKE A GOOD SCORE !"

This game is a prototype of 3D runner, so if you like it or if you find anything strange, all comments are welcome !

Code and art by Robowarrior.

Music Credits:

  1. 10,000 People Chanting, "I'm an Individual" by Nihilore
  2. Sparkwood & 21 by Nihilore
  3. Oblivious by Nihilore
